name: NGJ22-1
description:
# Instructions
  • WASD to move
  • Arrow keys to shoot
  • Blue powerups increase bullet speed
  • Purple powerups decrease bullet reload time

I intended to do rebindable keys but i didn't have time for it. Sorry for the inconvenience.

# Description

My entry for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1).

The theme was MINIMALISM which is perfect for people like me who just didn't have experience or time to do anything else.

The three extra challenges were:

  1. Alone...
  2. You are the Enemy!
  3. Everything is Dangerous!

I went with a twin-stick shooter type of game which satisfies the being alone and everything is dangerous challenges.

This is the first game i've made using Godot and probably the 4th game i've ever made in any engine that could be considered "completed" (completed being completely arbitrary...). I had a lot more planned for this but not enough time to dedicate to it.

# Credits
  • Game engine is Godot Engine (thanks for the tutorials!)
  • Music is an original chiptune done by myself
  • Sound effects from jsfxr
  • Font is from Yuji Adachi
